article_title: Black Friday: Local managers have great expectations

article_metadata.news_keywords: #black friday,#managers,#sales,#thanksgiving,#kyle chalk,#geek squad,#erick puckett,#season of shopping,#holiday season,local,editors_pick,featured

og.description: BRISTOL, Tenn. — Up until a few years ago the Friday after Thanksgiving has been the traditional kick-off for the Christmas buying season; this year retailers started offering their Black Friday deals the first week in November.
